feed.title: Announcing bip174.org, a web-based PSBT viewer and editor

entry.title: Announcing bip174.org, a web-based PSBT viewer and editor
entry.summary: Prayank expressed gratitude to Alekos for working on the bip174.org, a PSBT viewer and editor that runs in the browser. He suggested adding an option to switch between light and dark themes and highlighting some elements with different colors. Additionally, he proposed a similar project for descriptors with options to experiment with them. Prayank's signature includes his A3B1 E430 2298 178F code.
